name: Esmart Holdings
overview: Esmart Holdings Limited engages in the design, supply, and distribution of intermediate electronic products. It serves various segments of the electronic industry, including multimedia infotainment, data communications, wireless applications, and digital video services and systems. The company offers solutions ranging from designing the subsystems electronic products, including hardware design, firmware development, and PCB layout design to supplying the active devices, chipsets, and other electronic components. It also designs and develops solutions for television, DVD players, GPS/GSM location tracking devices, tracking technologies, telematics, radio frequency identification video streaming devices, video surveillance devices, and video-on-demand end-products. Esmart Holdings distributes its electronic components in the United States, Europe, China, Japan, Korea, and Taiwan. Esmart Holdings Limited was formerly known as Esmart Holdings Pte Ltd. and changed its name to Esmart Holdings Limited in April, 2003. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Singapore.

acquisitions.source_description: Esmart Holdings To Buy Solar Silicon Resources For S$307 Million
